resources.string: Parrot - Ayudante de Pronunciation - Francais Alpha

string-array.name: chat_array_english
string-array.item: You should stick to being an Accountant
Well done, You have the french level of an 8 year old. Only 26 more years to go!
Not bad for a blonde.
Didn\'t they teach you how to read properly at school?
I used to know a guy from Melbourne. They looked a lot like you, except attractive.
do you kiss your mother with that beak!?
You\'re trying too hard. Loosen up your beak a little more
Well done! two toes up!
Solene want a cracker?
Ther-r-r-re she blows!
Who\'s a pretty Solene?
Did you know, I taught my old student, Ginger Beard the Dreadful, to speak 17 languages fluently. He was a great student. Too bad about the disemboweling.
Warning! This next segment contains: Strong language, nudity and French.
How does every French joke start?… By looking over your shoulder
What do you call a runaway Parrot?… A polly-gone!
What\'s smarter than a talking parrot?… A spelling bee

string-array.name: chat_array_french
string-array.item: Tu as beux yeux, tu sais?
Quelles sont les deux plus vieilles lettres de l\'alphabet?… C\'est clair: A… et… G
un chasseur sachant chasser sans son chien est un vrai chasseur
Je suis ce que je suis et si je suis ce que je suis, qu\'est-ce que je suis?
